title: 发不了贴是怎么回事？
author: ruhuasiyu
txt_content:
我准备在游戏技巧版发个帖子，结果只要一点保存草稿或者发布就会出现：
500 Internal Server ErrorThe server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Please report this message and include the following information to us.
Thank you very much!URL:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=post&action=newthread&fid=39&extra=&topicsubmit=yesServer:cn-jsyz2-dxDate:2015/05/16 10:54:13Powered by Tengine


内容很正常，无非有一些表情图、外部贴图、链接、隐藏内容而已。

replies.author: 草
replies.txt_content:
这和内容无关
貌似论坛又出现问题了
尝试多刷新几次，或者等一会再试

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content: 正常 多试几遍 或者用IE浏览器 360也行

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
咕噜and呼噜 发表于 2015-5-15 20:58
正常 多试几遍 或者用IE浏览器 360也行
正常。。。。。。。。。。。。。

简直郁闷，我编辑了半天，结果全没了。。。。{:10_566:}

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content:
ruhuasiyu 发表于 2015-5-16 16:05
正常。。。。。。。。。。。。。

简直郁闷，我编辑了半天，结果全没了。。。。 ...
论草稿的重要性

replies.author: RemxOne1
replies.txt_content: 我早上發貼也是這樣 彈出這個頁面之後一直F5刷新就好

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
咕噜and呼噜 发表于 2015-5-16 01:23
论草稿的重要性
我点击保存草稿也是这样。。。

replies.txt_content:
